gw.solr.mapper

Class IDataHolder

  • gw.solr.mapper.IDataHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class IDataHolder
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    This interface is used to access the individual criteria for a Solr query

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        IntrinsicType

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addReference(KeyableBean bean)
      Adds bean passed in to the reference list if references are being collected. Use this API to add a reference to an entity bean that was involved the generation of Solr index data, but which cannot be inferred by the system. This means the bean id and version information, if available, will be checked when the message is sent to be sure
      void addReferences(Collection<KeyableBean> beans)
      Adds beans passed in to the reference list if references are being collected. Use this API to add references for a collection of entity beans that are involved the generation of Solr index data, but which cannot be inferred by the system. This means the bean ids and version information, if available, will be checked when the message is sent to be sure
      boolean isChanged(DataProperty dp)
      Checks to see if the data referred to by this DataProperty is present in the graph and if it or any parent is new or changed. Only applies to data elements that are keyable entity beans.
      T lookup(DataProperty dp)
      Finds the value in this dataholder for the field described by the specified DataProperty.
      T lookup(DataProperty dp, T defaultValue)
      Finds the value in this dataholder for the field described by the specified DataProperty or the default value in case the expected data is not present. Null is returned if the data is not the expected type.
      String lookupKey(DataProperty dp)
      Creates a key from the specified DataProperty in a format suitable for use in a URN. In general, paths are assembed into a single token with a lower case first letter and same case as path for the remainder. Name-Property pairs are similarly combined except any dotted prefix of the name will be stripped in case name is a qualified type name. For example, both <DataProperty path="/Contact/PublicID"/> and <DataProperty name="entity.Contact" property="PublicID"/> will be converted to the key "contactPublicID".

      • Methods inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • lookup

        T lookup(DataProperty dp)
        Finds the value in this dataholder for the field described by the specified DataProperty.
        Parameters:
        dp - the DataProperty for the field being requested
        Returns:
        The data for this DataProperty or null if not present or the wrong type.

      • lookup

        T lookup(DataProperty dp,
       T defaultValue)
        Finds the value in this dataholder for the field described by the specified DataProperty or the default value in case the expected data is not present. Null is returned if the data is not the expected type.
        Parameters:
        dp - the DataProperty for the field being requested
        defaultValue - the value to return if this value is not found or of the wrong type.
        Returns:
        The data for this DataProperty or the default value if not found. Null is returned if the data is not the expected type.

      • lookupKey

        String lookupKey(DataProperty dp)
        Creates a key from the specified DataProperty in a format suitable for use in a URN. In general, paths are assembed into a single token with a lower case first letter and same case as path for the remainder. Name-Property pairs are similarly combined except any dotted prefix of the name will be stripped in case name is a qualified type name. For example, both <DataProperty path="/Contact/PublicID"/> and <DataProperty name="entity.Contact" property="PublicID"/> will be converted to the key "contactPublicID".
        Parameters:
        dp - the DataProperty for the field being requested
        Returns:
        the key that describes this field

      • isChanged

        boolean isChanged(DataProperty dp)
        Checks to see if the data referred to by this DataProperty is present in the graph and if it or any parent is new or changed. Only applies to data elements that are keyable entity beans.
        Parameters:
        dp - the DataProperty for the field being requested
        Returns:
        true if this data element or any of its parents are New or in the ChangeField list of the respective parent bean.

      • addReference

        void addReference(KeyableBean bean)
        Adds bean passed in to the reference list if references are being collected. Use this API to add a reference to an entity bean that was involved the generation of Solr index data, but which cannot be inferred by the system. This means the bean id and version information, if available, will be checked when the message is sent to be sure
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean being referenced

      • addReferences

        void addReferences(Collection<KeyableBean> beans)
        Adds beans passed in to the reference list if references are being collected. Use this API to add references for a collection of entity beans that are involved the generation of Solr index data, but which cannot be inferred by the system. This means the bean ids and version information, if available, will be checked when the message is sent to be sure
        Parameters:
        beans -
